scripts.build: npm run pre && ng build --configuration prod
scripts.deploy: npm run build && az account set -s ac8c58b9-a2e7-44c9-bcf2-4b1f930c59b8 && swa deploy dist/browser -S ac8c58b9-a2e7-44c9-bcf2-4b1f930c59b8 --app-name stapp-personal --env prod
scripts.pre: typst compile assets/resume.typ assets/bruno-roque-resume.pdf && node assets/main.js
scripts.start: npm run pre && ng serve --configuration dev
scripts.watch: npm run pre && ng build --watch --configuration dev
